summary: Summons Sindragosa to Freeze some Ass!
descriptionHtml:
Summonable Sindragosa v0.1
Mod By Reelo2228
12/02/2012

{Content}
This adds a spell that summons Sindragosa to ur aid. 

I was fooling around with CKit and shaders and see what effects could be applied to the models ingame, and viola! 
In future i plan to import  her voice and sound effects and a proper looking model of Sindragosa... not sure if porting is allowed but i\'ll try my best.

P.S. After summoned she tend to follow u REAL close when there\'s no enemy, i suck at scripting(more like simply don\'t know how), so i don\'t know how to make her keep a distance or let her stay in the air.


{Installation}
Copy the \"Data\" folder within the .rar to the Skyrim Installation directory.
Check the mod in ur ModManager

Ingame: type * help \"Summon Sindragosa\" 0* then use the *player.addspell* command.

{Uninstallation}
Delete the Sindragosa.esp inside the \"Data\" folder.


{Credits}
Goes the Bethesda, lovely game man!
author: Reelo2228
